role.argrole: entity coming into existence in company of others

example.parse: (IP (PP-ADV (P 除) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 桧木)) (VP (VV 占) (LCP-OBJ (QP (CD 百分之七十)) (LC 以上))))) (PU ，) (LCP-SBJ (NP (NN 林)) (LC 中)) (VP (VV 伴生) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (DP (DT 其他)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 丰富))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 植物)))))
example.arg: 其他 *OP* *T*-1 丰富 的 植物
除 桧木 占 百分之七十 以上

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 比较)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 会) (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (NP-PRP (NN 肥胖)) (VP (VV 伴生)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 疾病)))))))
